mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, dueDate from tbl_board where bno > 0 and status = true order by bno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) from (select bno from tbl_board where bno > 0 limit #{countEnd}) board
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = '', content = '', writer = '', dueDate = null, updateDate = now(), status = false where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_board set title = #{br.title}, content = #{br.content}, updateDate = now() where bno = #{bno}
